channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Today I’ve read a bit from “Working Effectively with Legacy Code” by Michael C. Feathers … and a sentence from that boook, that caught my attention the most was: ‘To me, legacy code is simply code without tests.’ I’m still struggiling with horrific traumatic past events (sampling a few, as per to ‘bury adequately some past traumatic events of mine’ as in vs. ‘shoving them under the rug’): 2.
